summary: The Security Council, recalling its resolutions 1505 (2003) and 1503 (2003), and 1534 (2004), decides to reappoint Mr. Hassan Bubacar Jallow as Prosecutor of the International Criminal Tribunal for Rwanda with effect from 15 September 2007 for a four-year term, subject to earlier termination upon completion of the Tribunal's work, having considered the Secretary-General's nomination and the Tribunal's completion strategy.
